resources.string: Pacific ocean is larger than Southern ocean.
The Suez Canal is an artificial sea-level waterway in Egypt, connecting the Mediterranean Sea to the Red Sea through the Isthmus of Suez.
In particular, the Nile is the primary water source of Egypt and Sudan.
The Amazon River in South America is the largest river by discharge of water in the world, and according to some experts, the longest in length.
Lake Baikal is the world\'s deepest and oldest lake.
